Test Case 3:Market Maker creates new index FLEX percentage product Using Create New Product window with auction type as FLEX

Test Case 8:Verify that product state of newly created Index Percentage Simple product is Open
Test Case 9:Verify that percentage simple product can be created when the state of the product class is open
Test Case 10:Verify Percentage Simple product cannot be created when the state of the product class is Halt
